name: Mobolize
description:
Mobolize was founded in 2009 to enhance web application functionality and deliver a powerful new cost performance solution for enterprise field operations via our CacheFront™ product. Our unique patent pending technology leverages end-point caching and Cloud-Tethered™ management to optimize and ensure access to business critical web applications, such as Microsoft SharePoint®, no matter where you are in the field.
With Mobolize CacheFront™, our Enterprise Cache Management solution, the web applications you depend upon are always available and always fast, whether your internet connection is at the office (WAN, LAN), is in the field (cellular, satellite, WiFi), has limited and/or spotty internet access, or has no network at all. As part of field support, sales, or repair operations, completing the job properly the first time requires continuous access to the data you need to get your work done.
Utilizing CacheFront™, our customers have experienced significant increases in the effectiveness of their web-based applications while saving IT resources and greatly improving the user experience.
READ MORE...
